name: Minna de Asobou: Koinu de Kururin
overview: The actions of cute puppies are super fun! Refreshing action puzzle game! The rule is very easy. Just "turn around and connect"! Put a colorful puppy piece falling from above into a dog house of the same color and get a score. Massive chain & feeling refreshed at a stroke! In the case of a pinch, you can aim for a reversal with a special move "Kururin Smash". During the game, there are plenty of different modes such as "Kururin alone" that wins five courses, "Fighting Kururin" with up to 4 battle fun! In the "Everyday Kururin" mode where you can see the growth of Kururin in the graph, you can also register for the Wi - Fi ranking and compete with the players nationwide. (Google translated from the official Japanese WiiWare listing)
